Articles.Content: My rent controlled quantum hill.
Quarent Hill

Since you quartered the rent, I could afford a soup moat.

Hey Waiter, there is a moat of soup around **MY HILL.**

The Waiter keeps guarding the Hill, awaiting for The Hero, and the soup in the moat is out of unworthy ones.

Future Hero Hill.

A lone figure from a distant shore arrives at the hill. It is Konan the Karbarian. He claims the hill in the name of Krumb. He uses Kroutons to cross the moat.

Konan's Krumby Hill and Krouton moat.

A Kryptonian kryptokolony lying beneath for centuries, awakes.

KryptoKonan Krumby Kryll

Power of Jesus.

**TIME FOR A HILL CRUSADE**

**My Holy Hill.**

A wood grows on top 

HolyWood

I chop the tree down and commit sin on the hill.

**MY UNHOLY HILL**

The UN declares a year of hills.

UN  HOLY  HILL

Everything now starts with the letter H.

Pun Pholy Phill.

Hi hust hake hhe hill.

Hy Hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2021-10-15T16:53:40Z" title="10/15/2021 04:53  PM" data-short="2 yr">October 15, 2021</time> by AtomicTech**

HI Hake Hhe Hill Hack.

Hy Hill.

Jack comes to the hill.

HiJack Hill.

The year of hills from the previous few posts is over, and the UN holy hill has been destroyed by the kerbals working there (since the event is over, they aren’t receiving their standard pay of 100 kickback srbs a day. They use their spare boosters to destroy the hill)

i build a new hill.

**MY HILL**

UNESCO declares the reconstructed UN Holy Hill an object of ~~human~~ Kerbal historical ancestry.

Historical Hill

All the fanatics go mad.

Hysterical Hill.

Hysterical Hill gets hype.

Hypsterical Hill

They all get small hats, small beards and small glasses.

Hipster Hill.

One of them has broken leg.

Hip Hill

And has to hop around.

Hip Hop Hill.

A P2P Starship lands on top.

Hopper Hill.

A Hipster with a bad hip has a birthday party on the hill.

Hip Hip Hooray Hill.

They got the lizard with loud music.

~~Harrenhal~~ Harren Hill

Spoiler

![Fall_of_harrenhal_by_reneaigner.jpg](https://awoiaf.westeros.org/images/9/91/Fall_of_harrenhal_by_reneaigner.jpg)![5dae643bfec3d60df7b5c276bc4f5a2e.jpg](https://i.pinimg.com/originals/5d/ae/64/5dae643bfec3d60df7b5c276bc4f5a2e.jpg)

They get into Japanese teen fashion.

Harajuku Hill.
